title: Episode 207. “I’m 40, burned out, and don’t know what’s next in my life”
description: ﻿ Courtney (40) and Ray (41) have spent their entire adult lives in the structure of military life—but with retirement on the horizon, they’re about to face a future filled with choices for the first time. For Ray, that means walking away from the rank, routine, and pension he’s built for over 20 years and […] Source
author: Ramit Sethi
